ReVivoXyn Experts

Michael Collins, Ph.D.

Dr. Collins is the Global Head of R&D at ReVivoXyn Labs, bringing over 20 years of experience in early drug discovery and development. Prior to his current role, Dr. Collins served as the Project Director for the Division of Therapeutics at the National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA) and co-authored 34 peer-reviewed journal articles.
